goals__remit:
EuroPriSe GmbH operates the data protection certification program "EuroPriSe - European Privacy Seal" which certifies compliance of IT products, IT-based services and websites with EU data protection law. Hereby, EuroPriSe GmbH aims to promote visibility for privacy-friendly products, services and websites, to mobilize competition in privacy and to foster user trust.  
 
At this time, EuroPriSe's primary objective is to be accredited as a certification body pursuant to Art. 43 General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679 - GDPR) and to receive the European Data Protection Board's approval for EuroPriSe's certification criteria for IT-products and IT-based services pursuant to Art. 42(5) GDPR.  
 
Note: Where the criteria are approved by the Board, this may result in a common certification, the European Data Protection Seal.
